input.sentences: i took all my dogs on the trip .
i needed them for my sled .
i fed them and then i hooked them up to my sled .
it was time to get to work .
output.sentences: Sally entered in the iditarod this year.
Her friends, Carol and Rachel, came to cheer her on.
Her dogs were excited to be in the race.
Her lead dog, Malmomet, gave the vet a big kiss after he declared her fit to race.
Sally's dad, Vic, was proud of his daughter.
